text: w'ielam min allah warasulih w'indhar 'iilaa alnaas yawm alnhr 'ana allah bari' min almshrkyn, warasuluh bari' minhum kdhlk. fa'iina rajaetum -ayha almshrkwn- 'iilaa alhaqi wataraktum shrkkm fahu khayr lkm, wa'iin 'aeradtum ean qabwl alhaqu wabytm aldukhul fi din allah faelamuu 'anakum ln tuflitu min eadhab allh. wa'andhir -ayha alrswl- hwla' almerdyn ean al'islam eadhab allah almwje
